title: Trump Unlikely to Stop Bolton Tell-All Book
itunes:title: Trump Unlikely to Stop Bolton Tell-All Book
description:
National Security lawyer Bradley Moss, a partner at Mark Zaid, discusses the Trump administration seeking an emergency restraining order to stop the publication of a tell-all book by John Bolton, President Trump’s former National Security Advisor. June Grasso hosts.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
